description.value:
An image of a keyhole adorns the coat of arms of this stone tower shield (Hardness 20, HP 80, BT 40).

Activate 2 Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect The shield becomes a locked door in an empty, adjacent space no wider than 5 feet, becoming flush with the surrounding structure so it blocks all passage. The door has the same Hardness, HP, and Broken Threshold as the shield, with @Check[type:athletics|dc:43|traits:action:force-open] and @Check[type:thievery|dc:43|traits:action:pick-a-lock] to open.. The door remains in place for 1 hour, until it's opened or broken, or until you spend an action to end this effect, at which point the shield returns to your hand (or falls to the ground in your space if your hands are full).

Activate 1 minute (command)

Frequency once per day

Effect The shield floats lazily in the air as bricks quickly fly from it to form a tall stone keep around it. You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Resplendent Mansion], with the shield becoming the door.
